Reception by Nigerian ambassador
articles.content:
Reception by Nigerian ambassador
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Adoga Onah, Nigerian ambassador to Korea, gave a reception at the embassy on Friday on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Nigeria.
   Present on invitation were Pak Kil yon, vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
   Speeches were exchanged there.

articles.title: Staff members of Chinese embassy help farmers
articles.content:
Staff members of Chinese embassy help farmers
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Charge d'affaires Li Bin and officials  of the Chinese embassy here  visited the Korea-China Friendship Thaekam Co-op Farm to help it in farming on Friday.
   The guests gave helping hands to farmers in rice transplanting. 
   During a break, they sang songs and danced with the farmers, deepening friendship.

articles.title: Friendly meeting at Cuban embassy
articles.content:
Friendly meeting at Cuban embassy
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Cuban embassy in the DPRK hosted a friendly meeting on Friday on the occasion of the foundation day of the Korean Children Union, June 6.   Present on invitation were members of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee, teachers of the Korea-Cuba Friendship Moranbong Senior Middle School no. 1 and pupils of its Jose Marti class.   Jose Manuel Inclan Embade, Cuban ambassador to Korea, and embassy officials were present there.   The participants first looked round a car the President Kim Il Sung sent to the first Cuban ambassador to Korea, which is preserved in the embassy.   They played amusement games and talked to each other, deepening friendship.

DPRK delegation visits Tiantan park
articles.content:
DPRK delegation visits Tiantan park
   Beijing, June 4 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK led by Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on an official goodwill visit to the People's Republic of China, on Friday visited Tiantan park in Beijing, one of the ancient sites of historical interest in China, Friday afternoon.
   While hearing an explanation about Tiantan park, Kim Yong Nam and the members of the delegation looked round the park which has a long history and turned into a people's recreation ground.

DPRK delegation arrives in Hangzhou
articles.content:
DPRK delegation arrives in Hangzhou
   Hangzhou, June 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation led by Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on an official goodwill visit to China arrived in Hangzhou, the capital of Zhejiang Province,  today by special plane on a local tour.
   They were greeted at the airport by leading officials of Zhejiang Province and Hangzhou city.   The delegation left Beijing this morning.
